text: hi everyone is Helen here thank you for
dropping by my channel if you're looking
for some authentic Vietnamese home
cooking recipes you at the right place I
make new videos every week so please
subscribe to be notified when a new
video is uploaded here you will find all
kinds of Vietnamese food from noodles to
desserts from chicken - pork or seafood
and all kinds of Vietnamese bun in my
cooking tutorials I try my best to help
you cook your favorite Vietnamese dish
in the most authentic yet easy and fast
way possible I also share with you many
amazing cooking techniques to make your
experience in the kitchen much more fun
and enjoyable so just click subscribe
and you will get to see new video recipe
every week for free thank you very much
for your subscription and now you can
choose a playlist to get to know more
about Vietnamese cuisine thank you for
watching bye
[Music]
